original_text: And when he had so said, he shewed unto them his hands and his side. Then were the disciples glad, when they saw the Lord.
korean_text: 이 말씀을 하시고 손과 옆구리를 보이시니 제자들이 주를 보고 기뻐하더라

sentences.original_text: And when he had so said,
he shewed unto them his hands and his side.
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그들에게 자신의 손과 옆구리를 보여주셨다.
